#summary 自定义页面样式示例

==Facebook风格的个人主页==
{{{
body#profile .col-left{position:relative;top:-80px}
body#profile .col-center{position:relative}
body#profile .navigation,#profile .navigation-wrapper{width:100%}
body#profile .menu-bar{padding-bottom:0px}
body#profile .col-full{background-color:#EDEFF4}
body#profile .col-full .status-holder{padding-left:370px;width:auto}
body#profile .col-full .tabs-holder .tabpanel{width:auto}
body#profile .col-full .tabs-holder{padding-left:370px;width:auto}
body#profile .tabs-holder .tabpanel li:not(.current) a{background-color:#D8DFEA}
body#profile .tabs-holder .tabpanel li:not(.current) a:hover{background-color:#627AAD;color:white}
}}}

==页面皮肤==
在一个等级达到11级的帐户，使用首页换肤功能，选择一个皮肤后，在地址栏输入
{{{
javascript:document.querySelector("#hometpl_style style").textContent.replace(/\/\*.*?\*\//g,"")
}}}
Safari浏览器请输入
{{{
javascript:document.documentElement.textContent=document.querySelector("#hometpl_style style").textContent.replace(/\/\*.*?\*\//g,"")
}}}

即可得到皮肤的页面样式，下面是两个例子
===雪花===
{{{
html {background:url(http://s.xnimg.cn/xnapp/vip/resimg/hometpl/snowflake/bg.gif) repeat-x center top;}
body {background-color:transparent;}
a:link, a:visited {color:#00729A;}
.navigation .nav-body {background-color:#40A0E2;}
.navigation .nav-other {background-image:url(about:blank);background-position: right center;}
.navigation .menu-title a:link,.navigation .menu-title a:visited {color: #ffffff;_float:left;}
.navigation .menu-title a:hover {background-color:#2C90DB;}
.menu-dropdown-border {border-color:#3688A7;}
.navigation .blank-holder .banner {background-image:none;}
.menu-dropdown .menu-item a:hover {background-color: #00729A;}.menu-dropdown .menu-item li.show-more a:hover {background-color: #00729A;}.menu-dropdown .search-menu li a:hover {background-color: #00729A;}.menu-dropdown .optionmenu li a:hover {background-color: #00729A;}
.navigation .blank-holder .banner {padding:0 1px 1px;}
.panel.bookmarks {background-color:#F3FBFF;border:1px solid #CEE2EE;}#appNavHolder, .user-data {background-color:#F3FBFF;border-color:#CEE2EE;}
.panel.bookmarks .more div.apps{border:1px solid #CEE2EE;}.panel.bookmarks .more:hover a.legend,.panel.bookmarks .more.hover a.legend {border: 1px solid #CEE2EE;border-right: 0;}
.panel.bookmarks .more .apps ul li:hover,.panel.bookmarks .more .apps ul li.hover {background-color:#d6ecf9;}
.panel.bookmarks .footer{border-top:1px solid #CEE2EE;}
.home .section-header{border-bottom:1px solid #CEE2EE;}
ul.richlist.feeds li{border-bottom:1px solid #CEE2EE;}
.home .side-item{border-bottom:1px solid #CEE2EE;}
.feed-header ul{border-bottom:1px solid #CEE2EE;}.feed-header li.current {border:1px solid #CEE2EE;border-width:1px 1px 0;}
.publisher .status-publisher input.submit{background-image:url(about:blank);background-color:#40A0E2;border-color:#5BAEE6 #3688A7 #3688A7 #5BAEE6;}
.statuscmtitem{	background-color:#F3FBFF;border-bottom:1px solid #E6EFF7;}
.min-cmtbox {background:url(http://xnimg.cn/xnapp/vip/resimg/hometpl/snowflake/arrow.png);}
.show-all {background-color:#F3FBFF;border:1px solid #CEE2EE;}
.show-all a:hover{background-color:;}
#footer .copyright{border-top:1px solid #CEE2EE;}
.panel.bookmarks ul.apps li a.title:hover {background-color:#d6ecf9}
.feed-content{border-bottom:1px solid #e6eff7;}
.navigation{background-image:url(http://s.xnimg.cn/xnapp/vip/resimg/hometpl/snowflake/nav_bg.gif);background-position: right bottom;background-repeat:no-repeat;}.navigation .nav-other{background-image:none}.navigation .nav-body {background-color:transparent;}
.input-button,.input-submit{background-color:;border-color:;}
}}}
